page.title: 18RECREATION continued
page.content: riding, archery, navigation, crafts, natural history and an obstacle course. There are adventure holidays, action weeks and junior action weeks. {SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY The industries we have mentioned use computers as part of their business to keep records of what they have and produce. They use the computer printer to make leaflets to advertise their produce. The majority of people do not agree to tests done on animals. They believe they are cruel and a life should not bne taken for the sake of a human.
